name: Burger On Board
description:
[ARROWS to move; Z to jump; X to interact; M to stop background scroll; full screen in corner]

One ship. One minute. One life.

Taken aboard under the guise of being a regular burger, this hungry alien seeks to consume everything around it. Invade varying ships as a bloodthirsty burger alien. Frantically try to consume all the crew members aboard before time runs out.

It used to be that people would eat burgers. Now, burgers eat people.

Made as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2019:

Art by Cosmo Wegman (@crelishboy), code by Joshua Edwards (@glenk), music and sound design by Holden Vest (@holdenvest), additional design by Lulu Wegman (@enchilatte), additional voices by TeleJelly (@telejelly).
